TopicTitle: Recently purchased East West Quantum Leap Orchestra Silver

Articles.Content:
And boooooy I am loving this program. I feel like its a major hurdle in music creation. As I learn this new tool, let me bug you all for opinions and critiques

Here is my first full EWQL track

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/tower-in-the-fog

Let me know what you think!

Thanks peeps
Awesome! I've been considering getting this for a little while, any thoughts on the quality, ect?

As for quality, it is strides above the ones I was previously using (Philharmonic and Nexus) Each instrument is like having a band at my fingertips. It's great but at the same time, I find it so entrancing that it takes me twice as long or more to release anything. Which can be a good thing.
